Carbon

Carbon (Diamond)

Name: Carbon (Diamond)

Formula: C

Atomic Number: 6

Group: 14

Block: p

Relative Atomic Mass: 12.011

Discovery Date: Prehistoric

Appearance: Diamond is a colourless, transparent, crystalline solid.

Atomic Structure: 2,4

Uses: Jewellery, cutting rocks, driling
